price: Pero él y sus partidarios lo rechazaron y le dijeron: "Eres un hechicero o un loco".
arabic: فَتَوَلَّىٰ بِرُكۡنِهِۦ وَقَالَ سَٰحِرٌ أَوۡ مَجۡنُونٞ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: fatawallā biruk'nihi waqāla sāḥirun aw majnūnun
